translation.desejaassinar: Do you wish to sign the grades sheet? Afther signing you canÂ´t go back
translation.texto1: Sign grades sheet with the AMA application using your Digital Mobile Key or the Portuguese Citizen Card.
translation.texto2: Sign the grades sheet later.It's status will remain as filled
translation.texto3: When you finish the process in the plugin application, click on the button "Already signed"
translation.demonstra: Demonstration of the process o signing the grades sheet
translation.texto4: You must have the signature plugin running to sign
translation.texto5: Intall and run the plugin in order to continue signing the grades sheet
translation.guardardialogoerro: Invalid grades were inserted for the following students
translation.assinardialogoerro: For the signing of the sheet all grades must be filled
translation.assinardialogotitulo: Use the Autenticacao.gov application to sign the sheet
translation.sobrescreverdialogodescricao: The imported file will overwrite some of the current grades. Do you wish to continue?
